description: A collection of circles in a circular formation; there are many circles scattered above the main circular formation and two small clusters of circles to the left and below the main formation. Each circle has a different number in the center denoting how many lines stem from that point. There is a dark green triangle toward the bottom of the main circular formation, a pale green triangle in the cluster of circles to the left of the main formation, and a very small brown triangle in the cluster of circles below the main formation.

author.name: VertexArchive
author.description: An UNOFFICIAL archive of the New York Times' Vertex puzzle. This account is not affiliated with the NY Times. I just like the triangles.
